text:
ce="preserve">The 59th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards were held at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles, California on September 16, 2007 and were live on television on Fox at 8:00 p.m. EDT (00:00 UTC) for the first time in high definition (on tape delay three hours later on the West Coast of the United States at 8:00 p.m. PDT/3:00 UTC). The ceremonies were hosted by Ryan Seacrest.
Creative Arts winners.
Creative Arts Awards winners who were recognized at the Primetime telecast.

annotations.surface_form: West Coast of the United States
